questions.title: 无论怎么努力学习，汤姆还是没有通过考试。
questions.answer: No matter how hard he studied, Tom didn't pass the exam.

questions.title: 无论有多困难，去变成你想成为的人都不会太晚。
questions.answer: No matter how difficult it is, it's not too late to be the person youwant to be.

questions.title: 无论你是谁，我都会用极大的热情去爱你。
questions.answer: No matter who you are, I will love you with much enthusiasm.

questions.title: 无论你喜欢什么样的礼物，你爸妈都会买给你。
questions.answer: No matter what present you may like, your parents will buy for you.

questions.title: 无论我什么时候去那儿，我都看见玛丽在为她自己化妆。
questions.answer: No matter when I go there, I see Mary making herself up.

title: ——因为我是一个平凡的工人，我总感到自卑。
——不管你的岗位有多平凡，其目的都是为了服务大众。

answer.en: I always feel inferior because I am a characterless worker.
No matter how ordinary your post maybe, the object of the job is toserve the people.

title: ——你真的要走吗？
——无论我在哪里，我都会思念你。

answer.en: Do you really wish to go?
No matter where I am, I will miss you.

title: ——不要再管我了。
——不要这么说，无论你变成什么样，你都是我的孩子。

answer.en: Don't say so. No matter what person you might change, you are still mychild.
